name: Skirmish Line - United Front
detailed_description:
United Front

A new endless defense mode, the United Front game mode features the forgotten Allied forces in the Chinese-Burma-India theater. Command the Chinese forces with its motley set of equipment. Select from four distinct equipment sets to build and arm your squad, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Build your squad from a combination of American, British, German, and Soviet equipment. Do you choose to commit to one set of foreign equipment to capitalize on its strengths, or do you diversify to build powerful synergies?

New Enemies

A new set of enemies will bring new challenges, forcing players to adapt their strategies accordingly. Elite Kwantung Veterans will use advanced tactics to defeat your forces while the deadly Gas Troops employ chemical weapons to dislodge well entrenched positions. Kenpei Officers will call for ferocious infantry assaults in an attempt to completely overrun your lines. Mechanized infantry riding Type 1 Ho-Ha Half-tracks will drive straight up to your trench lines!

New Medals

Earn 10 new Chinese medals with their own bonuses from a new set of challenging tasks exclusive to the new United Front game mode. Effects from the Chinese medals will apply to the existing Defense in Depth and Sector Defense modes when applicable!

Plus Modes

Plus variants of the original Defense in Depth and Sector Defense modes will incorporate new enemies from United Front. Enjoy a redux version of the original endless defense modes with new enemies for a new challenge!

short_description: Explore the forgotten Chinese-Burma-India theater as you take command of the Chinese forces during World War 2. Build and arm your forces from 4 distinct equipment sets, consisting of American, British, German, and Soviet equipment in a brand new endless defense mode!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
